Package chess

package chess
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bishop
    This class represents a bishop in the game of chess.
    Board
    This is an abstract class that represents a chess board.
    Chess
     
    King
    The King class represents a king chess piece on a chess board.
    Knight
    The Knight class represents a chess piece that moves in an L-shape and can jump over other pieces.
    Pawn
    The Pawn class represents a pawn chess piece on a chess board.
    Queen
    This class represents a queen in the game of chess.
    Rook
    This class represents a rook in the game of chess.
